Well-performing businesses have positive margin.

Highly competitive businesses have small positive margin and scale (Amazon).

Engineers: X will do Y. 
Investors: We think X will do Y.
Partners: When will Y?
Compeititors: Y, but we also do Z.
Critics: X will never do Y, or Z.
Theorists: Y because Z.
Observers: Let’s see if Y or Z.
Fundamentalists: X only.
Result: X,Y,Z
Market: W

1046768030448046081.text: Best of all, it democratically opens access to $LPT early in the game to Ethereum wallets and technology-savvy participants. You need not be a VC to claim ownership in this network.

1046768028891975680.text: The MerkleMine has been an intriguing game (in the game-theoretical sense) which requires balancing exogenous factors like mining competition and gas price, as well as endogenous factors like efficiency.

1046768027356803072.text: MerkleMining is a software, not a hardware, activity. The best miners have developed proprietary software that scales the calculation of requisite Merkle proofs and optimizes tx submission to Ethereum.

1046768025444241409.text: MerkleMiners perform a valuable (and expensive) service for the network: performing the Livepeer airdrop. In return, they can build appreciable stakes in the network, speculating on its future success or further distributing tokens through sales.

1046768023196053504.text: The @LivepeerOrg MerkleMine is almost done! It has been an amazing case study in cryptoeconomics and staking networks. Check out our writeup on mining and network ownership, with @devinawalsh, here:https://blog.coinfund.io/livepeer-cryptoeconomics-as-a-case-study-of-active-participation-in-decentralized-networks-19a932415e0e …

1043887261870379009.text: Feeling philosophical this morning, so here is #decentralization rant #4,655.

1043861759055056897.text:
The properties of stateless smart-nations would be:

1. Virtual, as in galactically distributed

2. Self-Sovereign, as in governed by its constituents within its domain

3. Ethereal, as in opt-in and infinitely forkable at low costhttps://twitter.com/jbrukh/status/1043856750464684038 …

1043856750464684038.text:
A “nation” is a group of people culturally bound, and a “state” is a patch of land with a sovereign government. 

Decentralization technology then enables “stateless smart-nations”, physically distributed internet nations that are ethereal and self-sovereign.
